title: E6 â€“ En reise gjennom nordmenns hverdag
overview: The E6 is Norway's main road, stretches through the entire country and is 2,762 kilometers long.Program leader Truls Svendsen wants to get to know the people who live, work and travel along the road better and decides to drive the distance in a motorhome.The trip goes from Svinesund to Kirkenes, and on its way, Truls meets Ted the vacuum cleaner salesman, Marit the postwoman, Rigmor the trailer driver, Terje the vet, Ronald the shaman and many more.
